subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Dwight King scored the tiebreaking goal early in the third period, Jonathan Quick made 18 saves as the Kings rolled to the doorstep of their first Stanley Cup finals in 19 years.
snippet: Dwight King scored the tiebreaking goal early in the third period, Jonathan Quick made 18 saves as the Kings rolled to the doorstep of their first Stanley Cup finals in 19 years.
